sentences.en: All the days of his separation shall he eat nothing that is made of the vine tree, from the kernels even to the husk.
sentences.cn: 在一切离俗的日子，凡葡萄树上结的，自核至皮所作的物，都不可吃。

sentences.en: Brown bread contains the husk of wheat.
He is clearing wheat husk on the floor with a broom.
sentences.cn: 他正在用扫把清扫撒落在地上的麦糠.

sentences.en: He's a mere husk of his former self.
sentences.cn: (因为生病等原因)他只剩下个躯壳.

sentences.en: Health and joy are husk, do you think?
sentences.cn: 健康和快乐是无价之宝, 你认为 呢 ?

sentences.en: How can we remove the husk of the grains?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样去掉谷物的外皮?

sentences.en: I had winnowed the husk away when he came in.
sentences.cn: 他进来时,我已把糠筛去了.

sentences.en: Inside this husk there is a baffled man aged thirty.
sentences.cn: 在这个臭皮囊里仍然活着一位不可思议的三十岁的男子.

sentences.en: Money may be the husk of many things, but not the kernel.
sentences.cn: 金钱可以是许多东西的谷皮, 却不是里面的谷粒.

sentences.en: Psyllium Husk softens our stool and promotes contraction of the intestinal tract.
sentences.cn: 西莲谷能帮助软化排泄物,并可帮助维持消化道机能.

sentences.en: Rice Husk ash, Rice, Sugar and Other Commodities.
sentences.cn: 采购产品稻壳灰, 大米, 食糖和其他商品.

sentences.en: So she asked the Great Spirit if she could make little people of corn husk.
sentences.cn: 于是她去问大神她能否用玉米皮制作小人儿.

sentences.en: Soak the corn, leaving the husk on, in a bucket of water.
sentences.cn: 把玉米带壳浸入一桶水中.

sentences.en: The effect of stirring intensity on the structure of white carbon made rice husk is investigated.
sentences.cn: 研究了搅拌强度对稻壳制备优质白炭黑结构的影响.

sentences.en: The fuels include cornstalks, cotton stalks, rice husk and etc.
sentences.cn: 燃料包括玉米杆,稻草杆, 棉花杆, 稻壳等.

sentences.en: The husk of this coconut is particularly strong.
sentences.cn: 椰子的外壳很明显非常坚固。

sentences.en: There you are, in the coffin, or in an urn, your body reduced to a husk of meant-to-be's.
sentences.cn: 你现在是这副样子，躺在棺材里，或者骨灰盒里。 你的身体沦为一张毫无意思的臭皮囊。

words.tran_cn: 声音沙哑的；有壳的；强壮的
剥玉米壳的工作；农家碾米会
强壮结实之人；爱斯基摩人

trans.tran_en: the dry outer part of corn, some grains, seeds, nuts etc
to remove the husks from grains, seeds etc
to remove the husks from grains, seeds etc
